transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes ji boliye.
Executive: Ha Riman ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ha kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Riman ji main Pawan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Ek aapka sir concern aaya hua tha regarding account. Ha main change karwa raha hu main. Ha account manager change karwa raha hu.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha. Achcha kya ho gaya sir?
Customer: Ha. Kya hai dikkat ki baat ye hai na kal kal unhone mere ko quotation bheji.
Customer: Thik hai kal sham ki baat hai sham sham 6 baje quotation diya. Maine unko on call bola maine unhone quotation diya. Ha 5 ya 6 baje jab wo office se nikal gaye the tab quotation aayi thi.
Customer: Thik hai. A man ke chaliye 5 se 6 baje ke beech mein bheja hai thik hai. Average bata de raha hu. Hello.
Executive: Ha sun raha hu. Hello.
Customer: Ha sun raha hu sun raha hu. Fir maine unko bola wo bole ki jaise hi quotation bheja aap abhi pay karo.
Customer: Unhone bole abhi kaise pay kar du mere ko to approval lena ho kyuki main to 12000 ka approval leke baitha tha. A mere ko time do to unhone bola ki thik hai aap kal mere ko karwa lo kal karwa lena. Main bola thik hai. Kal raat ki meeting hui 10 baje main meeting karke na approval leke aaya. Morning mein hai na meri baat hui main office se nikal raha tha. Ha morning mein hai na nikal raha tha office ke liye jaise hi office ke liye nikla hu 10 11 baje ka time tha. Main office pahucha hu 2 baje. 2 baje jaise hi pahucha hu achcha jab morning mein meri baat hui maine bola ha approval mil gaya hai don't worry aaj karenge. Correct itna bol diya maine. Ab jaise hi karne ka time aa raha hai to kyuki main 2 baje office pahucha meri meeting thi. Meeting mein tha meeting a ha meeting mein tha main call kata. Uske baad se wo tad tada ke message likhne laga this is not fair ye wo falan bole yaar chup reh yaar. Ek to main meeting mein hu upar se tu hai na piche se hai na che che kar raha hai call karke. Upar se jab main call kiya yaar kya tarika hai ye. Wo bola are aap mere ko aisa kar diye hum aapke liye ye kiye wo kiya mat kar yaar mat kar. Mat kar mere liye mat mar mat kuch kuch mat kar apne liye bhi mat kar mere liye bhi mat kar kuch mat kar tu unke liye. Simple yahi bolunga aapko jab maine kal bol diya kal bol ke main aaj aaj karwana hai pura din hu kabhi bhi aaj aapka hoga to fir aap itna che che kyu kar rahe ho. Jab morning mein bol diya ki ha mil gaya approval to fir itna che che kyu kar rahe ho. Phone karke thok kar rahe ho irritate kar rahe ho. Ye irritate hua na karna.
Executive: Main abhi aapke wajah se ek minute main aapke wajah se aapke wajah se main apna kaam dhandha chhod dunga aur aap aapke na aise 37000 ke wajah se mera loss hua hai so aap aapko ghanta fark nahi pad raha hai.
Customer: Hmm. Sidhi si baat hai bhaiya bhaiya aapko ghanta fark nahi pad raha aap mere ko kyu nahi MDC ka hai na starting karwaye. Aap apna 6000 mera mare ho uska kyu nahi aap bharpayi de pa rahe ho. Aur upar se mere ko TrustSeal mein karne ke liye 6000 bhi kat rahe ho. Aapko to hai na ulta refund karna chahiye. Kehna thik hai pura ka pura refund karunga. Kya bakchodi hai. Sidha sidhi bolunga bhad mein gaya yaar tu band kar yaar main apna jo current meeting chal rahi hai jo project chal rahi hai usko bhi chhod du main tera kaam karu pahle. Nawab nahi ho gaya tu.
Executive: Kuch bhi karta hai aur main dekhiye aapka aapka main appreciate kar raha hu. Change karo change karo I don't want to talk with that guy. Tu mere ko 10 12 ginara mat gina bhai mat mat mat gina bhai mere ko mat gina mere ko nahi janna mat kar diya na mere liye mat kar dhanyavad main tera aisa nahi lena chahta nahi change karaunga leke jaakar. Hmm. Nahi thik hai leke jaakar main isko koshish matlab change deke change to ho jayega sir account manager aisa kuch hai. Abhi dekho ek change karo change karo mujhe bhai tu mere ko gina raha hai ki maine aapke liye kiya mat kar yaar mat kar mere liye kuch mat kar ja ghar ja.
Customer: Simple si baat hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir itna itna aisa nahi hai ki na matlab main call kaatu dekhiye dekhiye aap bhi aap bhi corporate life mein hai na bahut kiya hai. Ha ha aapne bhi corporate life mein ek call kaata hu. Tu mere ko likh raha hai this is not fair sir ye hai bhad mein gaya tumhara fair bhai. Change ho jayega sir is cheez ke liye nahi nahi sir dekhiye main uske liye na aapse maang raha hu dekho aisa nahi hai sir lekin shayad unhone kal ki date mein na teen char matlab approval ye sab cheeze bahut a ye sab aap bhi samajh rahe honge sir month end closing hai approval ki ye sab kuch lekin agar aap kehte hain ki aap na change karwana chahte ho main main sir change kar dunga dekho ek cheez dekho ek tarike se nahi hota hai sir ek account manager aapko assign kiya ho jata hai kyuki wo sab bahut kuch cheeze 500 500 catalog dekh raha hota hai 150 catalog ke kareeban rehta hai uske handling pe. Pawan ji suniye Pawan ji suniye ha chalte hue hai ha ha bataiye bataiye Pawan ji meri simple si baat hai. Ki problem ye hai ki aapko ghanta fark nahi pad raha IndiaMART ko ya fir aapko ya fir aapki koi bhi employee ko IndiaMART ghanta fark nahi pad raha ki mere do mahine barbad ho gaye paise chale gaye lekin ek jara ek 1000 ka din nahi banaya hu bhai. Main samajh raha hu sir actually kya hai na uske wajah se mera kya hua uske wajah se kya kar rahe ho ki aap mujhe upgrade karne ka suggestion bhi de rahe ho de rahe ho to main upgrade karne ja raha hu to aap bol rahe ho do mahine ka paise kategi. Aap to chutiya bana rahe ho na mere ko. Aapko to pahle band karwa lo na. Sir aap kya chahte hain aap wo bata do mere ko dekhiye main dekhiye dekhiye main sir itna chahta hu ki dekhiye main itna chahta hu ki sir hamare paas jo bhi hai MDC one ya jo uska jo client hai sir aapka jo payment hai aap samajhiye usme jo payment hai usme adjustment ke sath aapka upgradation sir services hum aapke paas sir koi bhi aisa nahi rehta ki hum kisi bhi client ko one year ki services provide kare clear ho gaya aapne jo pricing boli usi pricing pe unhone kiya hua hai sir teen se char baar to approval leke aayega approval tak jaate wo abhi abhi aap ha main aap hi ka wording bataunga aap jo
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is angry about service and refund.

- Account manager's behavior is unprofessional.

- Wants refund for unused services.

- Feels IndiaMART doesn't care about his business.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive offered to change the account manager.

- Executive explained the process for upgradation.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will change the account manager.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account manager, unprofessional behavior, upgradation
